title: 06/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP is joined by ESPN Radio NBA Analyst Jon Barry to recap last night's Hawk's win. Is the Trae Young/Luka Doncic argument any closer now? Pro Football Talk Live's Chris Simms reveals the remainder of his Top 40 QBs list. Which QB's are ranked where and why? And Islanders Radio PxP announcer calls in to discuss this caller last night as the Isles forced a Game 7 in NHL Eastern Conference Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
